targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"manta.*", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"manta.*", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

panels.title: Finish by status per rate interval  [$rate_interval]

panels.title: Manta integration job duration [$rate_interval]

list.description: A limit for the interval. Recommended to be set to write frequency, for example 1m if your data is written every minute. Default value can be set in data source settings for most data sources.
list.label: scrape_interval
list.name: scrape_interval

list.description: A limit for the interval. Recommended to be set to write frequency, for example 1m if your data is written every minute.
list.label: rate interval
list.name: rate_interval
